description: This file defines an introductory page component for a LightningJS-based quiz application. It includes UI layout with title, subtitle, buttons, and a tooltip, along with event handlers for navigation and tooltip display.

classes.name: default
classes.description: LightningJS component representing the intro page with layout, state, and event handlers.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the LightningJS component layout using an HTML-like template syntax.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state variables, including UI content and layout dimensions.

methods.name: components
methods.description: Returns the child components used within this component, namely Button.

methods.name: onReady
methods.description: Sets up event handlers after the component is rendered, including navigation and tooltip toggle logic.
